name: LILYDALE FLYING SCHOOL PTY LTD
about: Lilydale Flying School, also known as Yarra Valley Aviation, is based at Lilydale Airport in the picturesque Yarra Valley, Victoria, just 45 minutes east of Melbourne's CBD. The school offers comprehensive pilot training from Recreational Pilot Certificate (RPC) and Recreational Pilot Licence (RPL) to Commercial Pilot Licence (CPL) levels. Training is conducted in both electric and legacy aircraft, including the Pipistrel Alpha Electro. The school provides a range of programs, including scenic joy flights, air charters, and freight charter solutions. With experienced instructors and a variety of aircraft, Lilydale Flying School ensures students learn to fly safely and affordably. Prior permission is required to land, obtainable from Flight Operations at the school. Lilydale Flying School is dedicated to providing a thorough and enjoyable aviation experience for all its students.
services:
["INTRODUCTORY FLYING LESSONS
Recreational Pilots license
Private Pilots license
Commercial Pilots license
Instrument Rating"]
